title: Daily Scoring
planAlertNone: Today's check plan has not been created and no historical plan is available. Please ask the admin to create a daily plan.
planAlertAuto: Today's plan was auto-generated based on the semester schedule. Adjust in the Check Plan page if needed.
planAlertFallback: Today's plan was not created. Using the latest plan as fallback. Please ask the admin to set up today's plan.
emptyTitle: Click a class card above to start
emptySubtitle: After selecting a class, you can mark each item as pass/fail
profileGuidanceBalanced: Your inspection scale is consistent with the school average, keep it up
profileGuidanceLenientMild: Pass rate slightly above average, consider paying more attention to details
profileGuidanceLenientHigh: Pass rate significantly above average, consider reviewing against inspection standards
profileGuidanceStrictMild: Pass rate slightly below average, slightly strict overall
profileGuidanceStrictHigh: Pass rate significantly below average, please verify grading consistency
profileNoData: Not enough data yet, profile will appear after more records are accumulated
focusAlertDesc: The following items had class failures in the past 14 days, check carefully
